ALBA GROUP lawyers possess professional experience in corporate practice received in the largest international and domestic holdings.

The effective corporate structure of holding (group of companies) involves the following favourable consequences:

  • increase of controllability of business units entering into holding,
  • increase of holding capitalisation,
  • increase of tax efficiency of business organisation,
  • increase of level of legal safety of business.

Legal company ALBA GROUP renders to clients comprehensive range of services connected with corporate governance:

  • construction of corporate structure / Corporate reorganisation and re-structuring:
    • legal examination of corporate structure of holding (group of companies) for definition of its efficiency, providing working out of recommendations about elimination of the identified deficiencies of corporate structure,
    • working out of corporate structure of holding and realisation of package plan for its introduction,
    • complex reorganisation and holding restructuring according to the specific goals put by clients:
      • increase of efficiency of corporate structure,
      • pre-sale preparation of assets.

  • corporate issues:
    • realisation of the corporate events provided by the legislation,
    • complex support of transactions with securities,
    • securities issue,
    • advice on any questions concerning the legislation regulating securities turnover,
    • advice on general corporate issue;

  • protection of the shareholders (participants) rights:
    • legal examination of corporate documents with a view to reveal risks of possible abuses of rights from the other shareholders (participants) side or an executive body of the organisation,
    • preparation of recommendations on optimisation of corporate documents to provide protection of the shareholders’ rights,
    • strategy working out on protection of shareholders (participants) interests at occurrence of disputes,
    • representation of shareholders (participants) interests on corporate events (general meetings of shareholders (participants), meetings of boards of directors, etc.),
    • judicial protection of shareholders (participants),
    • criminal protection of shareholders (participants);

  • merges and acquisitions:
    • due diligence of acquired assets and advice on minimisation of risks,
    • structuring of transactions of merges and acquisitions,
    • Legal protection at hostile takeover.
